transpositions.title: The ISO Council
transpositions.text:
# The ISO Council

~? Council:
-comparable to the board of directors
-includes 25 members
-appoints the Technical Management Board

~? President's Committee:
-includes:
-principal officer
-vice presidents
-submits recommendations to the Council

~? Council Standing Committees:
-advise the Council
-specialized by domains

~? Policy Development Committees:
-conformity
-consumers
-developing countries
